summary: The scion of a powerful family is tasked with retrieving an estranged family member.
cast: Pawan Kalyan|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Pranitha|Boman Irani|Nadia Moidu|Hamsa Nandini|Mukesh Rishi|Srinivasa Rao Kota|Rao Ramesh|Ali|M.S. Narayana|Brahmaji|Raghu Babu|Vajja Venkata Giridhar|Navika Kotia|Krishna Murali Posani|Sameer|Brahmanandam|Aahuthi Prasad|Hema|Srinivasa Reddy|Gayatri Bhargavi|Dhanraj|Satyadev Kancharana|Mumtaj|Devi Sri Prasad|Rajitha|Bharath Reddy|Pammi Sai|Sivannarayana|Narra Srinivas|Amit Tiwari|Nalla Venu
title: Atharintiki Daaredi
